5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Ata' b. Yasar reported, on the authority of Abu Huraira, the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying:He who went towards the mosque in the morning or evening, Allah would arrange a feast for him morning or evening in Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمَشْىُ إِلَى الصَّلاَةِ تُمْحَى بِهِ الْخَطَايَا وَتُرْفَعُ بِهِ الدَّرَجَاتُ
chapter.eng-name: Walking to prayer erases sins and raises one in status
